name: SEPTEMBER 1998
description:
SEPTEMBER 1998

Something isn't right in Kitz River. The people are superstitious and they believe the GOATBOY is watching so you best behave.

███ YOU DON'T HAVE TO TELL THE TRUTH. ███

Controls:
- Movement - WASD or Arrow Keys
- Confirm - E or Enter
- Cancel - Q or Escape

███ THIS WAS MADE FOR THE 2020 HPS1 Halloween Jam 2020. ███

Dear Youtuber/Streamer, please post a link to your video/streams here on itch.io or message me on itch.io I would love to see your reaction/commentary.

███ THANK YOU FOR PLAYING SEPTEMBER 1998!  ███
